com.risk.main

Class Tournament

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.main.Tournament

  • public class Tournament
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Tournament class to run a tournament of multiple games among multiple maps
    Author:
    Harshil

      To check if a player has won the game
      static void playGame()
      Play game runs the a single instant of entire game from assigning countries, reinforcing armies, issuing orders to executing orders until either a player wins or the max number of allowed turns are played

      • begin

        public static void begin(java.util.List<java.lang.String> p_argumentTokens)
        Begin method to initiate the tournament
        Parameters:
        p_argumentTokens - arguments of maps, strategies, number of games and number of turns

      • playGame

        public static void playGame()
                     throws InvalidMapException
        Play game runs the a single instant of entire game from assigning countries, reinforcing armies, issuing orders to executing orders until either a player wins or the max number of allowed turns are played
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - the invalid map exception

      • issueOrder

        Issue order creates an order for each player

        public static java.lang.String playerWon()
        To check if a player has won the game
        Returns:
